attributes.title: Absolutely terrible app
attributes.review: I 🥺 Climbed 💪 Out🏳️‍🌈 of ↗️ my 👆 head 🗣 and 🌐 watched 👀 myself 👩🏻 implode 💥 a 🌧 thought 💨 without ❌ a 🦋 body 🧘‍♀️ oughta 🎈be 🐝 the 🙈 shot 💉 to 2️⃣ take 🤜 a 🤐 load 🍆 off 💦 my 🙇🏻‍♀️ brain 🧠 is 🧟‍♀️poison 💊 and 🐤 I’m 🐚 searching 🔍for 🔑 the ⬆️ antidote 🧪 but 🍑 every ✈️ time ⏱ I🧍🏻‍♀️find 📌 it 🤡 my 💎 defenses 🛡scream 😱 oh 💋 no 🎤 you ♒️ dont 🗽𝑤𝑜𝑎ℎ 🤩 Don’t vote for this racist orange trash 🙂💅

attributes.title: Messed with the wrong generation my little friend
attributes.review: An orange Cheeto who abuses children, is racist, and among other evils should not have his own app. This app was horrible and I wish my sleeping disorder took over my body to make me pass out to prevent me from downloading this app. All these comments about your app are so mean🥺💞✨listen to them😘✨🌸.

attributes.title: It’s just sooooo bad 😨❌😡
attributes.review: I tried to download the app but it just wouldn’t let it on my phone 📲 and I was sooooooo sad 😢 I really REALLY wanted it but I just 🧚🏻✨ couldn’t get it 🙁 and I hope you fix this app 😤because something must be wrong with it ❌ so I’ll try again later 🗓 I hope this app doesn’t get cancelled 🥺

attributes.title: gen z😹✨
attributes.review: i had very high hopes for this app but seeing that after i downloaded it my phone got hacked and a bunch of nude oranges started to appear on my camera roll🤮😡i am now deleting and DO NOT RECOMMEND IT!! please download at your own risk i wouldn’t want anyone to go through what i did😿😾anyways #canceltrump2020 #dontbantiktokscumbag

attributes.title: Don’t ban the app
attributes.review: Please don’t listen to the 1 star reviews there trying to get this amazing app banned. But politics aside there no reason to ban the app.

attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: This app is so bad it doesn't even work. When I open it it kicks me out. When u get on the text is all messed up and the screen is all glitchy. It won’t let me send anything no matter what I do and there isn't any way to fix it. If I could it would be zero stars

attributes.title: 💫tiktok💫
attributes.review: I downloaded this app to find out more information about our aMaZiNg president. You can imagine my disappointment when I opened the app and there was no useful information whatsoever. The app is extremely low quality and kept crashing. Sad to say but don’t recommend 😔

attributes.title: dissapointed 😔
attributes.review: This app took WEEKS to download!???! I wanted to see updates on our ~orange~🍊presidents plans for the future but I couldn’t do that due to the long wait.. AND once it finally finished downloading it crashed every 5 seconds. What a horrible app, I honestly have no other words on how disappointed i am.

attributes.title: Horrible!
attributes.review: This is not user friendly!!! I downloaded it for my grandma but she cant even use it! and it’s not because she doesn’t know how to use technology but cause she’s a POC a women and part of the lgbt community!!! horrible not user friendly and kept asking me to do these things without asking for my consent!!

attributes.title: This app is Awful
attributes.review: I was actual looking forward to get this app to support ✨the president✨ but it took a whole MONTH to download and then it asked me some very offensive questions💖 I feel very attacked🧚🏾‍♀️and threatened🌸 my cat was crying because of this app🦋and it told me to renegade myself off the app🔥I hope that this app becomes the 🤡circus🤡
